analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#107-108) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#204-242)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#310-333)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#404-418)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#422-439)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#504-508) is declared view but contains assembly code

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#535-550) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#546-548)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#471) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#509-515)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#504-508)
	- /unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#505-508
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#79)
TokenController.proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/19/0x87c260900c391559fd2816c9fbf078de37e2f520.sol#26-28) should be declared external
